speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Swoboda, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on Croatia’s 2006 progress report ( 2006/2288(INI) ( A6-0092/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Swoboda, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on Croatia’s 2006 progress report ( 2006/2288(INI) ( A6-0092/2007 ).
